text: David Karp (born July 6, 1986) is an American entrepreneur who started Tumblr in 2007. He sold the website to Yahoo! for US$1.1 billion in 2013. He was born in New York City. He started learning HTML when he was 11. When he was 15 he stopped going to high school. He was taught at home instead. In 2013, Forbes said that Karp's net worth is more than $200 million. His cultural and ethnic background is Jewish.http://www.yourjewishnews.com/2013/05/27238.html ==References== ==Other websites== *Tumblr Category:1986 births Category:American chief executives Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:American Jews
title: David Karp
